languages.text: "Вольный Торговец"{n}, — от голоса дознавателя леденеет кровь, -{/n} "Неужели эльдарская ересь одурманила ваш рассудок? За предательством всегда идет смерть — того, кого предали. Или же того, кто предал сам. Вы чуть не погибли в Комморре. Ваша свита... вы и сами знаете, что случилось. Не пора ли правосудию свершиться?"

"Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix's voice makes your blood run cold.{/n} "Has Aeldari heresy clouded your judgement? Treachery always means death — either for the traitor or the one betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know what became of them. Is it not high time that justice was done?"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец"{n}, — от голоса дознавателя леденеет кровь, -{/n} "Неужели эльдарская ересь одурманила ваш рассудок? За предательством всегда идет смерть — того, кого предали. Или же того, кто предал сам. Вы чуть не погибли в Комморре. Ваша свита... вы и сами знаете, что случилось. Не пора ли правосудию свершиться?"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader {n}, — the Interrogator's voice makes your blood run cold, —{/n} Had the Aeldari's heresy clouded your judgement? A betrayal always leads to someone's death — either the traitor's or the one who have been betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know yourself. Isn't it high time to pas judgement?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader {n}, — the Interrogator's voice makes your blood run cold, —{/n} Had the Aeldari's heresy clouded your judgement? A betrayal always leads to someone's death — either the traitor's or the one who have been betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know yourself. Isn't it high time to pas judgement?"

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人。”{n}海因里希冰冷的声音让你毛骨悚然。{/n}“莫非这个艾达灵族的异端言论干扰了你的判断吗？背叛的后果只有死亡，有时死的是叛徒，有时死的是遭到背叛的人。你差点死在科摩罗，而你的其他随从……你也知道他们的下场。即使如此，你也不愿意为他们伸张正义吗？”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix's voice makes your blood run cold.{/n} "Has Aeldari heresy clouded your judgement? Treachery always means death — either for the traitor or the one betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know what became of them. Is it not high time that justice was done?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人。”{n}海因里希冰冷的声音让你毛骨悚然。{/n}“莫非这个艾达灵族的异端言论干扰了你的判断吗？背叛的后果只有死亡，有时死的是叛徒，有时死的是遭到背叛的人。你差点死在科摩罗，而你的其他随从……你也知道他们的下场。即使如此，你也不愿意为他们伸张正义吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente». {n}El tono de voz de Heinrix te hiela la sangre.{/n} «¿Es que la herejía Aeldari le ha nublado el juicio? La traición se castiga siempre con la muerte, ya sea el traidor o la parte traicionada. Estuvo a punto de morir en Commorragh. Su séquito... ya sabe lo que fue de ellos. ¿No va siendo hora ya de que se haga justicia?».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix's voice makes your blood run cold.{/n} "Has Aeldari heresy clouded your judgement? Treachery always means death — either for the traitor or the one betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know what became of them. Is it not high time that justice was done?"

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente». {n}El tono de voz de Heinrix te hiela la sangre.{/n} «¿Es que la herejía Aeldari le ha nublado el juicio? La traición se castiga siempre con la muerte, ya sea el traidor o la parte traicionada. Estuvo a punto de morir en Commorragh. Su séquito... ya sabe lo que fue de ellos. ¿No va siendo hora ya de que se haga justicia?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, {n}lance Heinrix sur un ton qui vous glace le sang.{/n} L'hérésie aeldari aurait-elle obscurci votre jugement ? La trahison occasionne toujours au moins une mort : celle de la personne trahie, ou celle du traître. Vous avez failli mourir à Commorragh. Vous savez ce qui est arrivé à votre entourage. Le moment n'est-il pas venu de rendre justice ? »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix's voice makes your blood run cold.{/n} "Has Aeldari heresy clouded your judgement? Treachery always means death — either for the traitor or the one betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know what became of them. Is it not high time that justice was done?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, {n}lance Heinrix sur un ton qui vous glace le sang.{/n} L'hérésie aeldari aurait-elle obscurci votre jugement ? La trahison occasionne toujours au moins une mort : celle de la personne trahie, ou celle du traître. Vous avez failli mourir à Commorragh. Vous savez ce qui est arrivé à votre entourage. Le moment n'est-il pas venu de rendre justice ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!" {n}Heinrix' Stimme lässt dir das Blut in den Adern erstarren.{/n} "Hat die Aeldari-Ketzerei Euer Urteilsvermögen vernebelt? Verrat bedeutet immer den Tod – für die Verräter oder die Verratenen. Ihr wärt in Commorragh fast gestorben. Euer Gefolge ... Ihr wisst, was aus ihnen wurde. Ist es nicht höchste Zeit, dass Gerechtigkeit gesprochen wird?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix's voice makes your blood run cold.{/n} "Has Aeldari heresy clouded your judgement? Treachery always means death — either for the traitor or the one betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know what became of them. Is it not high time that justice was done?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!" {n}Heinrix' Stimme lässt dir das Blut in den Adern erstarren.{/n} "Hat die Aeldari-Ketzerei Euer Urteilsvermögen vernebelt? Verrat bedeutet immer den Tod – für die Verräter oder die Verratenen. Ihr wärt in Commorragh fast gestorben. Euer Gefolge ... Ihr wisst, was aus ihnen wurde. Ist es nicht höchste Zeit, dass Gerechtigkeit gesprochen wird?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者」{n}ハインリックスの声に、あなたは血の気が引く野を感じる。{/n}「アエルダリの異端が、判断を曇らせたのですか？裏切りとは常に死を意味するものです。裏切者にとっても、裏切られた者にとっても。陛下はコモラフで死にかけた。御身の従者が…どうなったのかを、お忘れではありますまい。そろそろ、正義が実行されるべき時ではありませんか？」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix's voice makes your blood run cold.{/n} "Has Aeldari heresy clouded your judgement? Treachery always means death — either for the traitor or the one betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know what became of them. Is it not high time that justice was done?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者」{n}ハインリックスの声に、あなたは血の気が引く野を感じる。{/n}「アエルダリの異端が、判断を曇らせたのですか？裏切りとは常に死を意味するものです。裏切者にとっても、裏切られた者にとっても。陛下はコモラフで死にかけた。御身の従者が…どうなったのかを、お忘れではありますまい。そろそろ、正義が実行されるべき時ではありませんか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, kanını donduruyor.{/n} "Aeldari kâfirliği, muhakemene gölge mi düşürdü? Hainlik her zaman ya hain ya da ihanete uğrayan için ölümle sonuçlanır. Commorragh'ta az kalsın ölüyordun. Maiyetin... Onlara ne olduğunu biliyorsun. Adaletin yerini bulma vakti geldi de geçiyor."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix's voice makes your blood run cold.{/n} "Has Aeldari heresy clouded your judgement? Treachery always means death — either for the traitor or the one betrayed. You almost died in Commorragh. Your retinue... you know what became of them. Is it not high time that justice was done?"

Commorragh'ta az kalsın ölüyordun. Maiyetin... Onlara ne olduğunu biliyorsun. Adaletin yerini bulma vakti geldi de geçiyor."
